com.stefansator.mensaplan

Class MealsRecyclerViewAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<MealsViewHolder>
      • com.stefansator.mensaplan.MealsRecyclerViewAdapter

  • public class MealsRecyclerViewAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<MealsViewHolder>
    Adapter for managing MealsViewHolder Objects. Creates and returns new ViewHolder Objects on Request to the RecyclerView or fills them on request with the appropriate data.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  MealsRecyclerViewAdapter.ItemSelectedListener
      Interface for implementing a listener for item selection.

    • Field Detail

      • meals

        private java.util.List<Meal> meals
        The data set of the RecyclerView. Contains all Mensa meals which should be displayed in the list.

      • context

        private android.content.Context context
        The current application context.

      • listener

        private MealsRecyclerViewAdapter.ItemSelectedListener listener
        The listener for item selection within the RecyclerView.
